branchCategory.name: JSY Non Plug-in Manifold
branchCategory.description: <p>Non plug-in type for JSY series is available in 3 valve body sizes, JSY1000 (6.4mm), JSY3000 (10mm) and JSY5000 (15mm).  It is available in side porting and bottom porting.</p>
